item.description:
Reviews for this are good and IMAX is always visually fun!  Please buy your ticket online here...(you can wait until closer to Sun. if yoy aren't 100% sure right away)... 4:30 show

http://imaxtixs.easytixs.com/JordansReading/SelectBusinessDatePage.aspx?dtticks=634349213849530000

...because a lot of IMAX shows do sell out!

We can hang out after, grab drinks, (or get ice cream and watch the water show etc. right there inside the complex) etc. if people want to since it will still be early!
item.how_to_find_us: Let's meet at the foot of the escalators you'll see when you walk in. Movie starts at 4:30. I'll be wearing jeans and a black jacket.
item.why: I love action movies in IMAX!
item.name: IMAX movie in Reading - "I Am Number 4" - Sun. afternoon movie outing! $11.50
